channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ingrid Lewis-Martin, Top Adams Adviser, Faces Fresh Corruption Charges

item.title: Judge Says Habba Has Served as U.S. Attorney Without Legal Authority
item.description: Defense lawyers had questioned whether Alina Habba, a Trump loyalist, was legally authorized to run the U.S. attorney’s office in New Jersey.

item.title: The white-collar job market is frozen—now bartenders and baristas are seeing bigger wage growth than desk workers
item.description: Gen Zers who are lucky enough to get an office job: Don’t expect a raise.

item.title: As Adams Tries to Run on His Record, Scandals Keep Swirling Around Him

item.title: Hurricane Erin Is Heading Out to Sea. People Are Riveted Anyway.
item.description: The Category 2 hurricane isn’t expected to make landfall. Still, it’s drawing notice as the first named storm to reach hurricane strength this year.

item.title: Bitcoin dips ahead of Fed Chair’s remarks at Jackson Hole
item.description: The world’s largest cryptocurrency is down almost 5% after notching an all-time high one week ago.

item.title: Trump’s Attacks on Fed Overshadow a Critical Moment for the Central Bank

item.title: China’s DeepSeek quietly releases an open-source rival to GPT-5—optimized for Chinese chips and priced to undercut OpenAI
item.description: DeepSeek is forcing the U.S.–China AI rivalry into sharper focus and may put OpenAI on the backfoot following its disappointing GPT-5 launch

item.title: Europe Gets a Written Trump Trade Deal, With a Caveat for Automakers

item.title: Anxiety Mounts in Gaza City as Israel Threatens a New Offensive
item.description: The Israeli military announced that it’s preparing to take control of Gaza City, where many displaced Palestinians have taken refuge.

item.title: French Authorities Investigate Death of Streamer Jean Pormanove After Months of Abuse
item.description: Raphaël Graven, known online as Jean Pormanove, was regularly subjected to humiliation and abuse on Kick, a streaming platform.

item.title: Vance Recounts Telling Zelensky to ‘Behave’ in Trump Meeting
item.description: It was not the first time that the vice president had addressed Ukraine’s leader with words more commonly spoken to toddlers than heads of state.

item.title: Israel Is Expanding Its Gaza City Operation, but Where Does It Stand?
item.description: The Israeli government is widening its operation in Gaza despite its generals’ advice and as it deliberates on a new cease-fire proposal.
